name: 林群哲
objective:
無機化學係化學三大骨架之一，日常生活中之各樣物質大部分是由無機材料製成，課程係以深入淺出方式教授，授課內容涵蓋主族元素與過渡元素。課程內容包括:原理、主族元素化學、硼族、第1, 2, 15, 16, 17 族元素、過渡元素化學、過渡元素、第一過渡系列元素、鈦,鉻,鈷,鎳,銅、原子結構、鍵結理論、對稱性、振動應用和群論、分子軌域與酸鹼化學。
Inorganic chemistry is one of the three frames of chemistry. Various materials in our daily life are composed of inorganic materials. This course will be given in a manner of easy-getting-point. The contents comprise of chemistry of main group elements and transition elements. The course covers the following topics: (1) Survey of principles (2) Chemistry of main group elements (A. Boron; B. Group 1, 2, 15, 16, 17 Elements) (3) Chemistry of transition elements (A. Survey of Transition Elements; B. Elements of the first transition series; C. Titanium, Chromium, Cobalt, Nickel and Copper (4) Atomic Structure (5) Simple Bonding Theory (6) Symmetry, Vibration Application and Group Theory (7) Molecular Orbitals and (8) Acid-Base and Donor-Acceptor Chemistry.
